root_explorer.title: Path of the Explorer
root_explorer.description:
§8You don't need to fight enemies if they can't catch up to you. Follow this path to train your stamina, agility, and luck to their very limits!

§aGet experience in this tree by finding and opening chests

luck.title: Lucky
luck.description:
§8You must be a punk because you're feeling lucky.

§a+0.25 Luck

scavenger.title: Scavenger
scavenger.description:
§8It's a good thing you grew up watching those survivalist youtube videos.

§a+10% Stamina Efficiency

sprint1.title: Sunday Sprinter
sprint1.description:
§8There are worse things for your health than sprinting once a week.

§a+3% Sprint Speed

sprint2.title: Monday Marathoner
sprint2.description:
§8How else would you start a great week than with your favourite activity.

§a+10% Movement Speed

long-arms.title: Long Armed
long-arms.description:
§8These freakishly long arms would've been useful to defuse the bomb an hour ago.

§a+1 Reach

loot-magnet.title: Loot Magnet
loot-magnet.description:
§8Items on the floor seem to be drawn to your body and you're not entirely sure why, but your back thanks you.

§a+1 Collection Range

aquaman.title: Aquaman
aquaman.description:
§8You move underwater like a dolphin.

§a+20% Movement Speed in Water

lavaman.title: Lavaman
lavaman.description:
§8You move underlava like a... like a... 

§8You move faster in lava.

§a+20% Movement Speed in Lava

deep-breaths.title: Water Breather
deep-breaths.description:
§8You played "who can hold their breath the longest" when you were a child and now it's time to put it to practice.

§a+20% Lung Capacity

bigger-jumps.title: Jolly Jumper
bigger-jumps.description:
§8You can jump higher.

§8Watch out for painful landings.

§a+50% Jump Height

elytra-expertise.title: Elytra Expertise
elytra-expertise.description:
§8Do a barrel roll!

§a+15% Elytra Turn Efficiency

§a+15% Elytra Rocket Efficiency

§a+15% Elytra Glide Efficiency

mega-jump.title: Holy Jumper
mega-jump.description:
§8You can jump SUPER high, just make sure you've equipped your paraglider.

§aActive Ability (G)

§aJump 20 blocks into the air

§cYou take more fall/elytra collision damage

teleport.title: Enderport
teleport.description:
§8You can shoot ender pearls out of your... uh, let's just say they come from your hands(?!)

§aActive Ability (G)

§aTeleport with ender pearls at will

§cYou get claustrophobic in small places (you get debuffed when the ceiling is too low)

phantom.title: Phantom
phantom.description:
§8You've eaten one too many phantom membranes and your body has begun to change.

§aActive Ability (G)

§aYou can switch to Phantom state at will, during which you will be invisible.

§cFood consumption is increased while in phantom state.

§cYou will take damage whilst in direct sunlight and not in phantom state.

phantom-pass-through.title: Ghost
phantom-pass-through.description:
§8You feel your connection to the phantom growing stronger.

§aActive Ability Upgrade (G)

§aYou can phase through walls and blocks in Phantom state

§8(You can not phase through obsidian or bedrock - duh.).)

gills.title: Gill-y Suit
gills.description:
§8You breathe underwater, but not overwater.

§aYou can breathe underwater

§aYou no longer have a mining penalty in water

§aYou do not fall in water

§cYou cannot breathe outside water

water-vision.title: Gill-y Suit
water-vision.description:
§8You breathe underwater, but not overwater.

§aYou can breathe underwater

§aYou no longer have a mining penalty in water

§aYou do not fall in water

§cYou cannot breathe outside water

wallclimb.title: Spider Steve
wallclimb.description:
§8Spider Steve, Spider Steve. Climbs whatever a Spider Steve climbs.

§aYou can climb walls

§cYou cannot use shields

§cYou exhaust yourself faster
